page.title: 15SHOPPING IN WOLVERLEY
page.content: The main shops in the area are in the village of Wolverley. In the 'old' village there is a {Post Office}which also serves as a general stores.There is also a{food {shop}in this part of the village. On the modern estate there are three shops.These are a{general {stores}, a{butchers}and a {hairdressers. There is also a{Garage }on the main road in the village.This sells petrol,second hand cars and does repairs. A{nursery}sells gardening and building products. In the outlying village of Blakeshall there is a small general stores.
